title: Ep 116 | Phil and the Quest to End Up Nowhere, Miss Kay's Amens, and Jase Sets the Record Straight
description:
Miss Kay is Phil's one-woman amen section — with a hilarious twist. Jase responds to people who think he's off base about being a king. Zach reveals the most common reaction he gets to doing a treasure hunting show with Jase and Jep. Phil describes Si's incomparable talent and learns about the Harlem Shake. And Jase shares stories about Bryson DeChambeau and Bubba Watson.

https://ScoreMaster.com/PHIL 

https://KCLundBlades.com 

https://Bambee.com/ROBERTSON 

Pre-order Jesus Politics by Phil Robertson: http://jesuspoliticsbook.com

See episodes of "Unashamed with Phil Robertson": https://bit.ly/2J4XsiX
 
See clips from Phil's TV show "In the Woods with Phil": https://bit.ly/2PNM6k1
 
To take a FREE 30 Day Trial of Phil's TV show and the rest of BlazeTV: https://www.BlazeTV.com/Phil
